DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research evaluate whether repeat screen Molecular Breast Imaging ( MBI ) study two year initial screen MBI study improve breast cancer detection woman dense breast tissue .
DOC.brief_title: Low-dose Molecular Breast Imaging : Comparison Breast Cancer Detection Rate Initial Screening Two-year Follow-up
DOC.criteria: Past prior screen mammogram within previous 1124 month interpret heterogeneously dense extremely dense negative benign [ Breast Imaging Reporting Data System ( BIRADS ) Category 1 2 ] Subjects exclude : Are unable understand sign consent form Are pregnant lactate Are physically unable sit upright still 40 minute Have selfreported sign symptom may suggest breast cancer ( palpable mass , bloody nipple discharge , axillary mass , etc . ) Have needle biopsy within 3 month , breast surgery radiation within 1 year prior study Are currently receive chemotherapy tamoxifen , raloxifene , aromatase inhibitor adjuvant therapy chemoprevention Have undergone bilateral mastectomy Have prior MBI within 20 month schedule study MBI .
